review: Received it today. Plugged it in and it does not work. Hangs on the network screen. You would have thought that the product team did a better job testing it out. From the numerous reviews here it appears they did not. I'm sure it will work fine when I can finally get it to work.
author: Leo

review: Waiting a month to get it was unexpected. Worth the 20 I paid. Nothing special about device.
author: Phillip Noonkester

review: Only gives you a little to watchyour choices are very limited
author: Len Hedrick

review: I love it, no comparison to the chromecast
author: Andre Burnett Jr. "Dré"

review: Works great. I like using it for Amazon Prime TV better than the Roku I had. Set was easy.
author: Please in Ohio

review: This is pretty much the same as a Fire TV as far as i can tell, but in a cheaper stick form.  A bit slower of a processor and half the memory of a Fire TV but it has performed flawlessly for everything we want to use it for!
author: G. Valentine

review: Fairly easy to set up, but battery compartment a little hard to open. Lots of viewing options. The additional power cable used by the Fire TV Stick was a surprise and not advertised...a bit of clutter for this otherwise compact device.
author: F. Degroodt
